subject: Gentle Follow-up on Remaining Commission Payment.
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I hope you are doing well.

I’m writing to kindly follow up regarding my commission payment. The total
commission amount is $281.95, and I have received $206.15 so far. There is
a remaining balance of $75.80 that has not yet been paid.

This balance has now been outstanding for nearly three months. I completely
understand that delays can occasionally happen, and I would really
appreciate it if you could share an update on the payment status and the
expected timeline for completion.

Receiving this payment would help me continue my work smoothly and maintain
the resources needed to keep creating value and driving sales for your
company.

Thank you very much for your time and understanding. I look forward to your
reply.

Kind regards,

David Long

conversations.body_text: Hi David Long,  We normally pay the commission for November in January. A batch of commissions was processed a couple of days ago, and payments over USD 100 were prioritized and sent out first.

Dear Support Team,

Thank you very much for your reply and for the update regarding the
November commission payments.

I would like to kindly follow up on my *August and September* commissions.
According to my records in *goaffpro.com <http://goaffpro.com>*, these
commissions have been pending for *four to five months*, and I have not yet
received the corresponding payments.

As it is now January, I sincerely hope you could help review my account and
arrange the payment of the outstanding balance at your earliest convenience.

In *2026*, I will continue my efforts to generate more revenue for your
company through my promotional activities.

Thank you very much for your time, support, and understanding. I truly
appreciate your assistance.

Best regards,

*David Long*

Vào Th 4, 14 thg 1, 2026 lúc 18:03 support@simsonn.com
